f7b94800-5505-422a-8daf-5212575c1478.description: Learners are able to understand how to bring design elements from InDesign into an annual report in Workiva to create an XHTML version of a report for regulatory or compliance filings.
f7b94800-5505-422a-8daf-5212575c1478.name: Design Reporting

badge_template_activities.title: Design Reporting

Want to get a sense of how businesses are thinking about—and preparing for—the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) climate disclosure ruling? Workiva and PwC commissioned a survey of 300 executives at U.S.-based public companies, asking them pressing questions about a range of challenges and opportunities related to ESG reporting and strategy; specifically focusing on the SEC’s climate disclosure ruling. Join us for a 60-minute webinar on March 14th as PwC and Workiva specialists

f0e56b11-b85c-447e-931a-804cea7a1487.description: Earners can advance XBRL dates in a filing, migrate to a new version of a taxonomy, create XBRL facts, review and update XBRL fact properties, recognize XBRL outline components and proper outline structure, and create and manage calculation relationships. With successful completion of this course, the earner will also be awarded 8 CPE credits.
f0e56b11-b85c-447e-931a-804cea7a1487.name: Using XBRL for SEC (IFRS) - XBRL Deep Dive

badge_template_activities.title: Using XBRL
Attended eight (8) hours of live Workiva training sessions on XBRL Deep Dive
Completed XBRL Partner Training Sessions on the Partner Resource Library.
This certification is only available to Workiva Partners.

e7fa7da3-4852-44c3-a8ee-671fab6b77de.description: Earners can utilize the IFRS taxonomy, understand common XBRL work flows, map and model XBRL to financial disclosures, understand the differences between a line item concept and a dimension, locate concepts within a standard taxonomy, and create extension concepts based on EDGAR Filer Manual requirements. With successful completion of this course, the earner will also be awarded 8 CPE credits.
e7fa7da3-4852-44c3-a8ee-671fab6b77de.name: Using XBRL for SEC (IFRS) - XBRL Essentials

11a720e5-031c-4422-b9a2-0758dc0db1f7.description: Earners can complete a thorough review of XBRL disclosures, address common XBRL issues and validation, and investigate some Data Quality Committee validations. With successful completion of this course, the earner will also be awarded 8 CPE credits.
11a720e5-031c-4422-b9a2-0758dc0db1f7.name: Using XBRL for SEC (IFRS) - XBRL Quality Review
